title: BRIEF-Attacq Ltd Says Support For Proposed Acquisition By MAS From Prime Kapital
text:
BRIEF-Attacq Ltd Says Support For Proposed Acquisition By MAS From Prime Kapital

Stock Markets 10 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 09:43)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Attacq Ltd Says Support For Proposed Acquisition By MAS From Prime Kapital Oct 28 (Reuters) - Attacq Ltd : * JSE: ATT - SUPPORT FOR THE PROPOSED ACQUISITION BY MAS FROM PRIME KAPITAL * ATTACQ LTD - ATTACQ HOLDS 146.8 MILLION MAS ORDINARY SHARES COMPRISING 22.84% OF MAS'S SHARES IN ISSUE
